column4: when I try to "apt-get update", I see errors like this: "Failed to fetch http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/dapper/restricted/source/Sources.gz  Connection failed [IP: 85.133.25.8 80] ".  but I can telnet to that port, and I can wget from that URL - so what could possibly be wrong?
it's possible the server is getting hammered
'cos telnet reliably connects, and apt-get reliably fails...
